name: Remorseless Lash
summary: You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking.
description:
You’re skilled at beating a foe when their morale is already breaking. When you succeed at a melee weapon Strike against a frightened foe, that foe can’t reduce their frightened condition below 1 until the beginning of your next turn.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
